Description: Gorgeous Beacon Hill one bed plus office. This tastefully renovated unit is located in the heart of Boston, just steps away from Mass general, shops, restaurants, and everything else Boston has to offer! This stunning one bed offers top of the line appliances, hardwood floors, recessed lighting, in unit laundry and a luxurious rainfall shower!! Security deposit negotiable. Submetered: tenants pays water and sewer. Dogs considered on case by case basis for additional $200 per month. Cats OK for an additional $150per month.
